headline: Northern Trust Sues Advisor Over ‘Blatant Fraud.’ He Allegedly Doctored Emails to Steal Client Funds.
summary: The Chicago financial services company alleges that Christopher Walters made a series of bogus disbursement requests from a client’s trust account.

raw.headline: Northern Trust Sues Advisor Over ‘Blatant Fraud.’ He Allegedly Doctored Emails to Steal Client Funds.
raw.summary: The Chicago financial services company alleges that Christopher Walters made a series of bogus disbursement requests from a client’s trust account.
